name: 2Base Technologies Pvt. Ltd
description:
2Base is an international Digital Transformation company. We develop Web, Mobile, and IoT based products by combining Engineering Technology with Business. We have been able to spread smiles and create a huge impact on people’s lives. Furthermore, we combine our experience in the business domain, business development, and technical expertise to provide the best end-to-end software solutions. Our offices are spread across the globe and have two deployment centers in South India.
Our services include Web and Mobile App Development, E-Commerce, CRM, Custom Software and Product Development for our clients. For the past 9 years, we’ve been providing high-quality Software Engineering and Consultancy Services for our clients. Our wide client base ranges from Bootstrap to Fortune 500 Companies. 2Base has helped many Startups and Businesses convert their Business Transformation ideas to reality. For clients who are not tech-savvy, we help them visualize the project through wireframes, mockups, and POCs and keep them updated throughout the development process.
